SELECT u.id,u.org_id AS orgId,u.code,u.phone,u.name,u.comments,u.create_time AS createTime,uu.name AS createUserName,u.vender FROM t_sys_user u LEFT JOIN t_sys_user uu ON uu.id = u.create_user WHERE u.is_del = 0 AND u.org_id IN
#{item}
AND u.name LIKE concat('%',#{key},'%')
ORDER BY u.create_time DESC

SELECT ou.id,u.name,u.phone,u.code FROM t_sys_user u LEFT JOIN t_sys_organization_user ou ON ou.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_organization o ON o.id = ou.org_id WHERE u.is_del = 0 AND ou.is_del = 0 AND o.is_del = 0 AND o.id = #{id}
AND u.name LIKE concat('%',#{key},'%')

AND u.name LIKE concat('%',#{key},'%')
